name: ivory lays egg in jungle
description:
hello, i made a simple game about my pet bird named ivory laying eggs to avoid them paparazzi birds.

controlls:

wasd or arrow keys/mouse to move (can change between mouse or keyboard input)

enter, space or LMB to shoot

esc to pause game and bring menu

how to play:

shoot them paparazzi's for points

collect millets (yes, those banana looking things that chase you is it) to gain preen

collect power ups for more eggs

gain 15000 points to win the gaem

lose the gaem for glamour shot of my pet birb

this game was made in godot engine. dedicated to my pet bird ivory. she a cute budgie.
